properties.author: By Rachel Monahan, Tess Riski, and Latisha Jensen
properties.title: Protests and Riots Fill the Streets of Portland. Four Black Leaders Are Trying to Bring Meaning to the Anguish.
properties.blurb: What makes this moment so perilous and important is, we simply donÕt know how long it will last or what it will mean. So we asked four black leaders at the center of the struggle.
